events.title: three ships land at Cape Henry

movie.title: The New World
movie.plot: A drama about explorer John Smith and the clash between Native Americans and English settlers in the 17th century.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 32 nominations.

movie.title: Killing Lincoln
movie.plot: April 14, 1865. One gunshot. One assassin hell-bent on killing a tyrant, as he charged the 16th President of the United States. And in one moment, our nation was forever changed. This is the most dramatic and resonant crime in American historyâ€”the true story of the killing of Abraham Lincoln.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.

movie.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
movie.plot: Growing up poor in Madras, India, Srinivasa Ramanujan Iyengar earns admittance to Cambridge University during WWI, where he becomes a pioneer in mathematical theories with the guidance of his professor, G.H. Hardy.

events.title: the movie Dolemite is released in theatres

movie.title: Dolemite Is My Name
movie.plot: The story of Rudy Ray Moore, who created the iconic big screen pimp character Dolemite in the 1970s.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 30 wins & 53 nominations.

events.title: the nuclear reactor at Chernobyl explodes

movie.title: The Battle of Chernobyl
movie.plot: On April 26, 1986, a 1,000 feet high flame rises into the sky of the Ukraine. The fourth reactor of the Chernobyl nuclear power plant just exploded. A battle begins in which 500,000 men are engaged throughout the Soviet Union to "liquidate" the radioactivity, build the "sarcophagus" of the damaged reactor and save the world from a second explosion that would have destroyed half of Europe. Become a reference film, this documentary combines testimonials and unseen footage, tells for the first time the Battle of Chernobyl.

movie.title: 127 Hours
movie.plot: The true story of mountain climber Aron Ralston's remarkable adventure to save himself after a fallen boulder crashes on his arm and traps him in an isolated canyon in Utah.
movie.awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 23 wins & 144 nominations.

events.title: Sarabjit Singh is beaten to death by Pakistani prisoners

movie.title: Sarbjit
movie.plot: Biopic of Sarabjit Singh, a farmer residing at Bhikiwind, Punjab, near the Indo-Pak border, crossed the border after having a couple of drinks. However, he was mistaken to be an Indian spy and was sentenced to capital punishment. The movie is about the Journey of a woman (Aishwarya Rai) who fights for 23 years to clear her brother's name after he is posthumously accused of terrorism.
